鶣字的基本解释

鶣
piān
〔鶣??（
pi乷 ）〕轻捷，如“鶣鶣燕居。”

鶣
biǎn
古同“扁”，姓。

鶣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［piān］
［《集韻》紕延切，平，滂。］
见“鶣”。

鶣字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鶣； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1495第07
【集韻】紕延切，音篇。鶣?，輕貌。【傅毅·舞賦】鶣?燕居，拉㧺鵠驚。又【集韻】【類篇】?婢典切，音辮。姓也。古有扁鵲。或作鶣。又【集韻】婢忍切，音牝。義同。

鶣字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鶣字的起名意思

暂无。

鶣
Basic explanation of words
鶣
piān
〔鶣?? (
pi 乷)] Light and agile, such as "Swallow's house."
鶣
biǎn
Gu Tong "Bian", last name.
鶣
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［piān］
["Ji Yun" Yan Yanqie, flat , pang. ]
See "鶣".
鶣
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鶣; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 1495 Page 07
[Jiyun] Yan Yanqie, sound chapter.鶣?, light appearance. [Fu Yi·Dancing Fu] Yanju, stunned. Also [Jiyun] [Class Chapter]? Maid code cut, sound braid. Last name also. There was a Bianque in ancient times. Or make 鶣. [Jiyun] The maid forbears and cuts, and the sound is 牝. The same meaning.
